comment: * Encapsulates the DRM properties of the source.

methods.name: public Map<UUID, byte[]> getPssh()
methods.comment: * Returns the PSSH info of the data source for each supported DRM scheme.

methods.name: public UUID[] getSupportedSchemes()
methods.comment:
* Returns the intersection of the data source and the device DRM schemes.
         * It effectively identifies the subset of the source's DRM schemes which
         * are supported by the device too.
